title: new mail didn't support backgroud color
content: reply mail support backgroud color, but new mail didn't support backgroud color
creator: walkerxk

title: TB 115.1.0 new calendar entry has a shift of +9hrs
content:
When I create a new entry the calendar (TB 115.1.0) the entry is moved by 9hrs after sync with server.

If I enter an entry using my Mobile and talke a look in TB calendar, the entry is correct.

In Settings all timezones seems to be correct (System: UTC+1)

Any hints? Thanks for support, Christian
creator: christian.weber

title: Lost Emails on Upgrade
content: I upgraded from Thunderbird 102 to 115. All my emails disappeared. How do I get them back?
creator: lfreerock

title: Highlight/message bar is not working to select messages for me to read and or delete.
content: HI! Thanks for your help. When i open thunderbird, the blue message highlight bar appears, but soon dissapears and I dont know why its been like this for months, I have done an update, turned it on and off etc. Any ideas please? its on my laptop and I use windows. thanks so much
creator: heavyhorse
